tidbits.title: Diverse Cultures and Ethnicities
tidbits.description: Nigeria is known for its diverse cultures and ethnicities, with over 250 ethnic groups, each contributing to the country's rich heritage.

tidbits.title: Natural Resources
tidbits.description: The country is abundant in natural resources, including oil, and has a growing economy despite facing challenges like corruption and poverty.

tidbits.title: Nollywood and Arts
tidbits.description: Nigeria's vibrant arts scene, especially Nollywood (Nigerian cinema), showcases its cultural influence and storytelling prowess globally.
